item.description:
The last time we did the Liquid Lounge at the Science Center it was a blast!! We're doing this event once again because it was a lot of fun along with 6 floors of non stop fun. The information is posted below: Liquid Lounge: Homegrown
Friday: September 9, 2011
6-10 PM
--------------------------​-----------------------
From the fair to the farm, get local at the Connecticut Science Center’s 21+ party.
...
- Dance with resident DJ John Rzasa
- Tenor saxophonist and West Hartford native Noah Preminger
- String Theorie-Central CT's favorite instrumental world fusion band
- The 1st Liquid Lounge Sports Bar welcomes CT's beloved mascots
- Sing Karaoke and become an instant Liquid Lounge celebrity
- Play your favorite local Fair Games
- Rooftop star-gazing (weather permitting)
- Free samplings of CT's best beers, liquors, and foods

MORE INFORMATION AND ENTERTAINMENT TO BE ANNOUNCED SOON!

Tickets:
$10 if purchased by September 8th at www.CTScienceCenter.org/Li​quid
$15 at the door
$10 for Science Center Members

As always, 1000+ friends and liquid delights. Normal parking rate apply. Garage open until midnight.

Thank you to our sponsors: The Greater Hartford Jaycees Foundation, Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute, The Greater Hartford Arts Council, Hartford Advocate, Kiss 95.7
item.how_to_find_us: Call or text Christian at 860-357-7264 or John at 860-919-9782
item.name: Liquid Lounge: Homegrown
